about: My name is John Rice and I am a 25 year old developer from Laurens, SC! In 2021, I obtained a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Winthrop University, along with a minor in Mathematics.
projects:
2023
  • serketcity.github.io - A small site made with Vue.js.
2022
  • PreMiD Presences - An app for displaying browser activity in Discord via Discord's Rich Presence. Contributed support for Homestuck.com, Homestuck2.com, and Deconreconstruction.com. Made with TypeScript.
2021
  • Vriska8ot - A general-use Discord bot. Originally built with Python, currently being converted to JavaScript.
Academic Projects
  • LakeWylie.biz - Capstone project for Computer Science program. Partnered with a local client to build their desired product with fellow students. Made with Meteor in 2021.
  • Personal Forum - Final project for a web development course. Made with JavaScript (using Express, Pug, Sequelize, and Socket.io) in 2020.
